cloning.description: Indicates the number of servers whose paired target servers are being cloned.

cutovering.description: Indicates the number of servers whose paired target servers are being launched.

deleting.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a deleting migration status.

error.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in an error migration status.

finished.description: Indicates the number of servers whose paired target servers have been launched.

initialize.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in an initializing migration status.

replicate.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a replicating migration status.

skipping.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a skipping migration status.

stopped.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a paused migration status.

stopping.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a stopping migration status.

syncing.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a synchronizing migration status.

unavailable.description: Indicates the number of servers that fail the environment check.

unconfigured.description: Indicates the number of servers that do not have target server configurations.

waiting.description: Indicates the number of servers that are in a waiting migration status.
